title: Autism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/21
itunes:title: Autism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/21
description:
George Noory and author J.B. Handley discuss his teenage son's journey from being a non-verbal autistic child to being able to fully communicate thanks to a new technique that not all teachers feel is effective but has shown him great results.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
